title: Gooey Toffee and Chocolate Oat Slices
ingredients: ['400g individually wrapped dairy toffees', '3 tablespoons milk', '175g butter or margarine', '125g plain flour', '80g porridge oats', '175g dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '170g plain chocolate chips']
